item.title: Chapter title:
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌Chapter title:‌ 10 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002105 ShortTitle: WITHME10 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference purposes only.] In my vision virtue has nothing to do with morality. A virtuous man is beyond the moral and immoral. A virtuous man is not calculative. He acts spontaneously, not out of certain principles.

item.title: Chapter title: Bliss
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Bliss‌ 4 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002045 ShortTitle: WITHME04 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference purposes only.] Money is not your goal, power is not your goal, God is not your goal, truth is not your goal. These are different names which you go on giving to bliss.

item.title: Chapter title: Consciousness
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Consciousness‌ 5 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002055 ShortTitle: WITHME05 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference purposes only.] The goal of the meditator is to find out who he is. When one goes on enquiring "Who am I?" "Who am I?

item.title: Chapter title: Love
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Love‌ 9 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002095 ShortTitle: WITHME09 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference purposes only.] You have to become more conscious so that you can discover your lovingness, so that you can discover the lovingness of the whole existence and once you know, you start sharing.

item.title: Chapter title: Man\'s Nature
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Man's Nature‌ 8 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002085 ShortTitle: WITHME08 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference 1/08/07 Copyright Osho International Foundation 1994 Osho's books on CD-ROM, published and unpublished Query:- purposes only.] My work here is to make you aware of your great potential, of your infinite possibility, of the heights that you can reach, of the depths that you can penetrate.

item.title: Chapter title: Music
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Music‌ 7 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002075 ShortTitle: WITHME07 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference purposes only.] Once the mind is gone there is no need of meditation. One is simply pure music, celestial music, sacred music. That music has been called by different names; Tao, Dhamma, God.

item.title: Chapter title: None
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: None‌ 1 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002015 ShortTitle: WITHME01 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference purposes only.] We have chosen the colour of the morning for sannyas to symbolize that each sannyasin is nothing but the birth of a new sun.

item.title: Chapter title: Prayer
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Prayer‌ 6 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002065 ShortTitle: WITHME06 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference purposes only.] God is for gamblers who can risk all for the unknown. The gambler is not really interested in winning. His whole interest is in gambling.

item.title: Chapter title: Truth
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Truth‌ 3 February 1980 pm in Chuang Tzu Auditorium Archive code: 8002035 1/08/07 Copyright Osho International Foundation 1994 Osho's books on CD-ROM, published and unpublished Query:- ShortTitle: WITHME03 Audio: No Video: No [NOTE: This is an unedited tape transcript of an unpublished darshan diary, which has been copy-typed. It is for reference purposes only.] Sannyas is to be true to your original face.
